TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 作为所有 ASP.NET 运行状况监视审核事件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET health-monitoring audit events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类是 ASP.NET 运行状况监视审核事件类派生自的基类。The class is the base class from which the ASP.NET health-monitoring audit-event classes derive. 审核事件生成的 Web 应用中与安全相关的操作有关的信息，并为每个审核操作提供成功和失败的事件。The audit events generate information about security-related operations in a Web application and provide both a success and failure event for each audited operation. 运行状况监视系统可以审核成功和失败的事件，这意味着应用程序监视正常和不能正常工作条件。The health-monitoring system can audit both successful and unsuccessful events, which means an application can be monitored for both normal and malfunctioning conditions. 默认情况下，记录失败的审核事件。By default, only the failure audit events are recorded. 以下操作由 ASP.NET，审核，并且可能会生成运行状况监视审核事件的成功或失败：The following operations are audited by ASP.NET, and may generate success-or-failure health-monitoring audit events: - 所做的 ASP.NET 应用程序的用户的登录尝试。Login attempts made by users of an ASP.NET application. 有关此审核的详细信息，请参阅和。For more details about this auditing, see and . - 与安全相关事件，例如身份验证失败次数、 失败的资源的访问尝试次数和其他与安全相关的事件。Security-related events, such as authentication failures, failed resource access attempts, and other security-related events. 调查入侵或应用程序的攻击时，这些事件的日志很有用。The log of these events can be useful when investigating an intrusion or attack on the application. 默认情况下，授权失败的匿名用户不提供了任何审核的支持。By default, no auditing support is provided for authorization failures of anonymous users. 有关失败事件审核的详细信息，请参阅和。For more details about failure event audits, see and . - 由 ASP.NET 应用程序引发的自定义事件。Custom events raised by an ASP.NET application. 你可以通过扩展提供的功能，审核自定义事件类和派生的类You can audit custom events by extending the functionality provided by the class and derived classes > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类来创建自定义审核事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom audit event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/CS/webauditevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/VB/webauditevent.vb#1)] 下面是使 ASP.NET 能够使用该事件的配置文件的摘录。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the event. ``` ```

para.span: 在设置格式显示你自定义事件信息，重写方法而不是方法。

span.span: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method.

para.span: 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the supplied parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你不应使用它来实例化对象，但你在实现您自己的从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to call this constructor. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/CS/webauditevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/VB/webauditevent.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你不应使用它来实例化对象，但你在实现您自己的从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to call this constructor. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用提供的信息属性，以帮助中的故障原因的发现。Use the information provided by the property to help in the discovery of the causes of a malfunction. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取请求信息通过属性。The following code example shows how to obtain request information through the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/CS/webauditevent.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/VB/webauditevent.vb#5)]
